name: Digitalhound Ltd
description:
Digitalhound offers a full range of Digital Marketing Services.
Based in London with a customer base across UK and Europe, key people within the agency have been shaping and refining cutting edge digital marketing strategies for some of the best known British brands over the past 19 years.In a highly competitive digital world, the agency focuses on providing a high quality service that thoroughly analyses and improves a brand's key strengths and market perceptions, delivering high impact customer focused marketing and better acquisition ROI strategies.The company prides itself on driving consistent results for its'â€‹ clients and boasts a proud 97% retention rate.With all the hype and misinformation within the digital marketing space, Digitalhound offers a high quality transparent service backed up by proven expertise, that companies working with this London SEO agency discover to their benefit.
